page.title: 12Life in Stapleton.
page.content: {Stapleton}is a small village along the Ashby Rd .There is a fair variety of houses,dating from 1714.One man has claimed that{King Richard's}men met in his back garden.There is only one shop and one public house. { {AGE OF HOUSES IN STAPLETON POST WAR 1945-85 35 INTER WAR 1918-39 18 Victorian+Edwardian 1837-1913 3 Georgian 1714-1836 2 { {OCCUPATIONS:}included the following; Machinist,Librarian,Secretary,College student,Store Manager,Company director Butcher,Mechanic,Carpet fitter,Teacher { {DISTANCE PEOPLE TRAVEL TO WORK MILES O-4 4.1-8 8.1-12 >12 NUMBER 9 3 2 4
